children.value:
import Server from './server'
import Client from './client'
import Optional from './optional'
import ArticleDetails from '../../../components/ArticleDetails'

These instructions are for a quick MVP traditional install of Aspera. The install is for
the most basic client/server architecture available to support transfer between a client
and a Linux server. For more detailed information and advanced configuration details
please refer to the latest version of the
High Speed Transfer Server product documentation

<Accordion>
  <AccordionItem title="Install and configure Aspera on the Server">
    <Server />
  </AccordionItem>
  <AccordionItem title="Install and configure Aspera on the Client">
    <Client />
  </AccordionItem>
  <AccordionItem title="Optional Config">
    <Optional />
  </AccordionItem>
</Accordion>
